subject: 2012~2013学年度第一学期高一课改、音美期中考试英语试题（卷）时间：100分钟

questions.content:
1.My father likes playing golf；He's really enthusiastic_______ it.
A. by B.with C. about D .on

2. She started laughing loudly when I began to sing，which made me feel very ________
A. amazed B.excited C.embarrassed D. interested

3. The book gives some important________ on how tocollect stamps.
A. advices B.information C. informationsD. idea

4.Can you help him____ the 17 horses _____ his threesons fairly？
A. divide；intoB. separate；from C. divide；among D. separate；among

5 Will $200 the cost of the damage？-I'm afraid not. I need at least $100 more.
A.do B. includeC. cover D .afford

6. ______do you find the lessons of Senior Highteachers？-Lively and interesting.
A.What B. HowC. Why D. When

7 Life in the city is quite different from_____ in thecountry(乡下).
A.不填B.that C.it D. theone

8 May I open the window to let in some fresh air? _____
A come on B Take care CHold on D Go ahead

9 ---Honey, let’s go out for dinner.
---______ I don’t have to cook.
A Forget it B That’sgreat C why? D Go ahead

10 Plants need great care to grow well.______, a childrequires a good education to become a useful person.
A Surprisingly B Formally CSimilarly D Scientifically

11. Don’t you remember ___?
A. seeing the manbefore B. to see the manbefore
C. saw the man beforeD. to have seen the man before
choices: D. to have seen the man before

questions.content:
12. My first impression _____ Mrs Zhang was that shewas nervous and shy.
A. for B.on C. of D.by

13 As a young man from a rich family, can you imagine___ in such a small and dirty place?
A. to work B. yourself towork C. working D.work

14.-----I’ll be away on a business trip. Would youmind looking after my cat?
-----Not at all. ____.
A. I’ve no time B. I’d rathernot C. I’d like it D. I’d be happy to

15 .The changes in the city will cost quite a lot,_____ they will save us money in the long run.
A. or B.since C. for D. but

16 .We should keep _____ English every day.
A. to practice speaking B.practice speaking
C. practicing speaking D.practicing to speak

17 I would appreciate______ if you could help me.
A that B itC this D you

18 Many people are now _____ becoming a super star.
A dreamed B dreamedof C dreaming D dreaming of

19 In some parts of London, missing a bus means_________ for another hour.
A waiting B to wait Cwait D to be waiting

20 I’m sorry I forgot _______ your dictionary. Let’sborrow one from li Ming.
A to take B taking C to bring Dbringing

groups.name: II、完形填空： (共15小题，每小题1分，满分15分)

questions.content: Long long ago, there was a swan（天鹅）with golden feathers（金羽毛）.Shelived in a lake. A woman lived in a small house[k1]the lake with her twodaughters. They were very poor. They worked hard all year round,[k2]still,theylived a hard life and sometimes they even didn’t have enough[k3]to buy food.The swan was [k4]to see that. She said to herself, ―I’ll give one of my[k5]to them each day, then they canlive a happy life with the money selling my feathers.‖That evening, she [k6]to the poor woman’s house andleft a golden feather on the table without saying[k7].From then on, the swamcame every day and gave them a feather. The woman was very happy because theirlife was much[k8]than before. But day after day, the woman became greedy（贪婪）.She said to her [k9].”Theswan may fly away one day. If so, we will be poor again. We should takeall[k10]feathers shen she comes next time.” “Oh, no, Mom!‖cried thedaughters, ―This will [k11]the swan. She helps us a lot!‖But the mother wouldn’t listen. When the [k12]came asusual, the mother caught her and took all her feathers. But suddenly, thegolden feathers [k13]chicken feathers. Then ,the Golden Swan said, ―Poor Mother, I came to [k14]you,but you wanted to killme. Now, I am leaving and will [k15]come back. Never be greedy!‖With these words, the swan flew away.

groups.name: III、阅读理解（共20小题；每小题2分,满分40分）

questions.content:
阅读下列短文,从每题所给的四个选项(A、B、C和D)中,选出最佳选项。 高

A
Once there lived an old man in a town. Healways forgot a lot of things. So his wife always had to say to him，"Don't forget this."
　　One day hewent on a long way alone. Before he left home，hiswife said，"Now you have all these things. Youneed them on your way. Take care of your things on the way."He went to thestation. He bought a ticket and got on the train with it.
　　About anhour later，the conductor began to see the tickets. Hecame to the old man and said，"Will you pleaseshow me your ticket?"The old man looked for his ticket in all his pocketsbut he could not find it. He was very worried. "I can't find my ticket. Ireally bought a ticket before I got on the train，"saidthe old man.
"I think you are right. I believe youbought a ticket. All right，you don't have to buyanother ticket，"said the conductor kindly. But theold man still(仍然) looked worried and said sadly，"You don't know why I'm worried. If I don't findmy ticket，I can't remember my station. Where am Igoing? "

1. The old man bought a ticket [k1].
　A. after hegot on the train
　B. before hegot on the train
　C. when theconductor told him to buy one
　D. when hefound he had no ticket with him
choices: A. after hegot on the train
B. before hegot on the train
C. when theconductor told him to buy one
D. when hefound he had no ticket with him

questions.content:
2. About an hour later，theconductor began [k1].
　A. to buy thetickets
　B. to lookfor the tickets
　C. to checkthe tickets
　D. to showthe tickets

3. The conductor told the old man that he didn't needto buy another ticket because [k1].
　A. the manwas very old
　 B. hethought the old man had no money with him
　　C. the oldman showed him the ticket
D. he believed the old man
choices: B. hethought the old man had no money with him
C. the oldman showed him the ticket
D. he believed the old man

questions.content:
4. The old man still looked worried because [k1].
　　A. hecouldn't get on the train.
　　B. he losthis ticket and a lot of money
　　C. hethought his wife would get angry with him
　　D. he forgotwhere he was going
choices: A. hecouldn't get on the train.
B. he losthis ticket and a lot of money
C. hethought his wife would get angry with him
D. he forgotwhere he was going

questions.content:
5. Which of the following(下列) is right?
　　A. The oldman went on the trip with his wife
　　B. The oldman didn't find his ticket
　　C. Theconductor was also an old man
　　D. The oldman had to buy another ticket
choices: A. The oldman went on the trip with his wife
B. The oldman didn't find his ticket
C. Theconductor was also an old man
D. The oldman had to buy another ticket

questions.content:
B
My friend Mattand I arrived at the Activity Centre on Friday evening. The accommodation（住处） wasn't wonderful，but we hadeverything we needed (beds，blankets（毛毯），food)，and we were pleased to beout of the city and in the fresh air.
　On Saturday morning we met the other ten members ofour group. Cameron had come along with two friends，Kevin and Simon，while sistersCarole and Lynn had come with Amanda. There were some other members I didn'tknow. We had come from different places and none of us knew the area.
　We knew we were going to spend the weekend outdoors，but none of us was sure exactly how. Half of us spentthe morning caving while the others went rock-climbing and then we changed atlunchtime. Matt and I went to the caves(岩洞) first.Climbing out was harder than going in，but after agood deal of pushing， we were out at last. Though we werecovered with mud，we were pleased and excited by what we'ddone.

1. The writer spent the Saturday morning [k1].
　　A. rock-climbing
　　B. sleeping
　　C. meeting friends
　　D. caving

2. There were [k1] members in all in the writer'sgroup.
　　A. 6　　　 B. 8　　　 C. l0　　　 D. 12

3. We can learn from the passage that [k1].
　　A. some of the group had been there before
　　B. the group had done rock-climbing many times
　　C. some of the group already knew each other
　　D. group all came from the same city
choices: A. some of the group had been there before
B. the group had done rock-climbing many times
C. some of the group already knew each other
D. group all came from the same city

questions.content:
4. The write thought her weekend was [k1].
　A. interesting　　　　　　　　 B.relaxing
　　C. frightening　　　　　 　　 D. unpleasant

5. This passage mainly talks about [k1].
　　A. the writer's friends at the Activity Centre
　　B. the writer's experience at the Activity Centre
　　C. outdoor sports at the Activity Centre
　　D. how to go rock-climbing and caving
choices: A. the writer's friends at the Activity Centre
B. the writer's experience at the Activity Centre
C. outdoor sports at the Activity Centre
D. how to go rock-climbing and caving

questions.content:
C
My parents taught me not to waste food. Mymom always found ways to make leftovers （剩余食物）tastegood. I went to Ilan to learn about some of their special foods. As I was there，I learned about the food and the history of the area.I learned that they don‘t waste food，either，and they use leftovers！
Many years ago，there was not enough food for everyone. People learnedto cook and eat almost everything. They had to think of ways to make specialdishes. One of these dishes is kao zha. It‘s made withleftovers like meat，soup，oil and fat.That might not sound very good，but it does taste good.Today，kao zha is a special dish at big banquets （宴会）。
Another famous dish is called zao bing. It‘s made with fruit，meat andother things. I really liked it！But I didn’t want to eattoo much. It has a lot of fat in it.
I smelled something burning and I saw smoke，so I found another special food of the Ilan area─duck meat. The duck meat is put in a big oven （炉子） to cook it. Smoke keeps the meat fresh. I don’tusually eat meat，but this duck meat was delicious！It tasted sweet.
Ilan is a great place with delicious food.I hope I can come back again！

1. The writer learns from her parents [k1].
A. not to eat leftovers B. to eat good food
C. not to waste food D. to make good food

2. She finds that people in Ilan [k1].
A. always waste food B. don‘t use leftovers
C. don‘t have enough food D. can cookspecial food

3. Kao zha is a good dish that is made with[k1].
A. fruit，meat andother things B. fresh and sweet duck meat
C. some different leftovers D. meat，soup and fruit
choices: B. fresh and sweet duck meat

questions.content:
4. There are [k1] kinds of specialfoods mentioned in the passage.
A. two B. three C. four D. five

5. From the passage，we know that [k1].
A. there was not enough food in Ilan longago
B. leftovers can‘t be used to cookdelicious food
C. zao bing is a famous dish without anyfat in it
choices: A. there was not enough food in Ilan longago
B. leftovers can‘t be used to cookdelicious food
C. zao bing is a famous dish without anyfat in it

questions.content:
D
A man was travelling abroadin a small red car. One day he left the car and went shopping. When he cameback, its roof was badly damaged.
Some boys told him that anelephant had damaged it. The man did not believe them, but they took him to acircus which was near there. The owner of the elephant said, "I am verysorry! My elephant has a big, round, red chair. He thought that your car washis chair, and he sat on it!"
Then he gave the man aletter, in which he said that he was sorry and that he would pay for all thedamage.
When the man got back to hisown country, the customs officers would not believe his story. They said, "Yousold your new car while you were abroad and bought this old one!"
It was only when the manshowed them the letter from the circus man that believed him.
1. A man was travelling abroad[k1].

A. in a big bus B.in a green jeep
C. in a redcar D. in a redtaxi

2. The car was damaged because[k1].
A. there was atraffic accident B. the circus man broke it
C. it rushedinto a shop D. theelephant sat on it
choices: B. the circus man broke it

questions.content:
3. The circus man said that[k1].
A. he would pay for part of the damage
B. he would pay for all of the damage
C. he wouldn't pay for the damage
D. he would buy a new car
choices: A. he would pay for part of the damage
B. he would pay for all of the damage
C. he wouldn't pay for the damage
D. he would buy a new car

questions.content:
4. When the man got back to his country, thecustoms officers[k1].
A. would check his new car B.only checked his car
C. searched him D.wouldn't believe what he had said,
choices: A. would check his new car
D.wouldn't believe what he had said,

questions.content:
5.It was only[k1] that made theofficers believe him.
A. the letter from the circus man B.a newspaper from the country
C. the certificate of his D.the letter from the government
choices: A. the letter from the circus man

groups.name: IV.短语填空（共10小题；每小题1分, 满分10分）

questions.content:
同学们来到职中也已经两个多月了，请以My newschool 为题写一篇英语作文，你可以从学校，老师，同学三方面描述一下你的感受。
要求：1 字迹工整，字数100字左右
2 要有自己的真情实感。
